Feature.Name: Alignment
Feature.Text: Githzerai tend toward lawful neutral. Their rigorous training in psychic abilities requires an implacable mental discipline.

BonusFeature.Name: Monastic Training
BonusFeature.Text: You gain a +1 bonus to AC while you aren’t wearing medium or heavy armor and aren’t using a shield. All githzerai receive basic training from monks, and the monks among them are unmatched in their defensive abilities.
BonusFeature.Condition: not Medium and not Heavy and not Shield

MultiFeature.Name: Githzerai Psionics
MultiFeature.Text: You know the mage hand cantrip. When you reach 3rd level, you can cast shield once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. When you reach 5th level, you can cast the detect thoughts spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells. You can cast all of them without components.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Githzerai Psionics
BonusSpellFeature.Text: You know the mage hand cantrip. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells and you can cast it without components.

BonusSpellFeature.Name: Githzerai Psionics

BonusSpellFeature.Text: You can cast the detect thoughts spell once with this trait, and you regain the ability to do so when you finish a long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells and you can cast it without components.

SubRace.Name: Githzerai
SubRace.Description: In their fortresses within Limbo, the githzerai hone their minds to a razor’s edge.
